testsuite.name: Exceptions in cucumber hooks must result in failed scenario execution

testcase.name: Execute some hook before scenario

error.message: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!

testcase.error: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!
testcase.system-err: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution! steps.hooks.TestHooks.setup(TestHooks.java:11) cucumber.runner.UnskipableStep.executeStep(UnskipableStep.java:22) cucumber.runner.Runner.runPickle(Runner.java:80)

testcase.name: Execute some hook before scenario outline

error.message: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!

testcase.error: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!
testcase.system-err: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution! steps.hooks.TestHooks.setup(TestHooks.java:11) cucumber.runner.UnskipableStep.executeStep(UnskipableStep.java:22) cucumber.runner.Runner.runPickle(Runner.java:80)
